Package edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.impls.text

Class Summary
TextBackEndLSP A fully-implemented BackEndLSP that uses the Lucene search engine to access an unindexed, text-document collection.
TextDocumentEnum An implementation of DocumentEnum used to parse plain text files for indexing by the Lucene search engine.
 

Exception Summary
TextParseException Used to indicate that something has gone wrong with the regular- expression based parsing of a document.
